name: 3D Robot Wars of Steel Battleship Run: Infinity Survival Machine Running Game
name_original: 3D Robot Wars of Steel Battleship Run: Infinity Survival Machine Running Game
description:
RUN IN URBAN FUTURISTIC CITY of LIGHT and AVOID CRASHING INTO SPACESHIP!!!

Very few gamers could reach the 1 MILLION point mark - are you one of them???

AMAZING 3D Graphics which will keep you hooked! A GROOVY Soundtrack to KEEP YOU GOING in this ADVENTURE of a LIFETIME!

Run as different characters of robots man:
Cyborg, Floyd, Otomax and Nanotron

Collect coins on the way and reach 1 Million Points.
Game Features

-3D Running Game
- Swipe your screen to move the character.
- 4 Awesome robots.
- Crazy Power ups!
- 3rd Person Mode
-AWESOME soundtrack
- Unlock Survivor Mode

DONT MISS IT!
Download this game now!
